profile.title: PROJECT MANAGER ROLE
profile.summary: Manages projects to achieve optimal performance and results.
profile.mission: Defines, implements and manages projects from conception to final delivery. Responsible for achieving optimal results, conforming to standards for quality, safety and sustainability and complying with defined scope, performance, costs, and schedule. Deploys agile practices where applicable.
